pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python MirAIe AC APIAn API to send commands and read the status of MirAIe air conditioners by Panasonic**Installation**```pip install py-miraie-ac```**Usage**```import asynciofrom api import MirAIeAPIfrom enums import AuthTypefrom device import Deviceasync with MirAIeAPI( auth_type=AuthType.MOBILE, login_id="YOUR_MOBILE_NUMBER", password="YOUR_PASSWORD" ) as api: await api.initialize() for device in api.devices: print("Found device: ", device.friendly_name) device.set_temperature(24) device.turn_on()asyncio.get_event_loop().run_until_complete(start())
